comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: His son Joel W. Bunkley Jr. was Dean of the Law School at the University of Mississippi: www.time.com/time/magazine/article/0,9171,901064,00.html His grandson Joel W. Bunkley III is also a lawyer: carolinaveteranslawyer.com/aboutus.html

Susannah

comment.author: 54675371@N07
comment._content: Admiral Bunkley had 3 sons- Joel W. Bunkley Jr. was Dean of the Law School at the University of Mississippi, a younger brother Allison Bunkley was a professor of history at Princeton in his early 20’s, the youngest professor at the time and author of a seminal book on Sarmiento www.jstor.org/pss/2509494. (Also see: the Allison Bunkley Memorial Scholarship at Princeton), and he had another son at age 68 in 1955, Brit Bunkley, an artist and professor now living in New Zealand www.britbunkley.com
